title: Flipped Learning-Based Team Collaboration Human Resource Management Training

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding Basic Human Resource Management Concepts and Organizational Behavior
context.additional_context: HRM education course combining team-based learning and flipped learning in a smartphone-based limited technological environment

learning_goals: Develop self-directed learning habits through flipped learning modules and complete at least 3 hours of pre-learning per week
Achieve at least 80% competency in peer assessment and knowledge-sharing skills through team-based assignments
Write and present a project report applying HRM core theories (recruitment, evaluation, compensation systems) to real-world cases
Actively participate at least twice weekly in online discussion platforms and achieve a motivation/satisfaction score of 4 or higher (5-point scale)

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
